H0.text: where is simple squamous epithelium found in the body. Blood vessels

H1.text: where is simple squamous epithelium found in the body. Kidney glomeruli

H2.text: where is simple squamous epithelium found in the body. Liver sinusoids

H3.text: where is simple squamous epithelium found in the body. alveoli

A4.text: Simple squamous epithelium is found in endothelium (lining of blood and lymph capillaries)

A5.text: Simple squamous epithelium is found in glomeruli

A6.text: Pulmonary edema: Impaired gas exchange in the alveoli.

A7.text: Atherosclerosis: Endothelial dysfunction leading to plaque formation in blood vessels.
